summary: The head of a yakuza gang is being trailed by a mysterious, vengeful blind woman.
cast: Meiko Kaji|Hoki Tokuda|Makoto Satô|Hideo Sunazuka|Shirô Ôtsuji|Tôru Abe|Yoshi Katô|Yôko Takagi|Tatsumi Hijikata|Shirô Yanase|Shinzô Shibata|Ryôhei Uchida|Bumon Kahara|Akira Takahashi|Yûzô Harumi|Hiroshi Chô|Toshizô Kudô|Nobuko Aoki|Yoko Otaki|Masami Maki|Chieko Harada|Nobuko Yamabe|Yasue Nishihara|Iwae Arai|Kokan Katsura|Yoshihiko Tabata|Shirô Ôhama|Ken Mizoguchi|Hiroyuki Atami|Eisuke Izumi|Kuniya Mizukawa|Wataru Kobayashi|Takashi Seyama|Daisuke Ômi|Mitsuru Sawa|Tadayuki Kitakami|Toshio Aoki
title: Hîchirimen bâkuto - Nôbarydu takahadâ
